abstract: Liberian government issues recommendation, supported by United Nations health experts, that survivors of Ebola practice safe sex until more data is available concerning how long the virus can remain viable in body fluids.
lead_paragraph: After an Ebola death, scientists want to gather more information on the length of time the virus might remain present in semen.

headline.main: Liberia Recommends Ebola Survivors Practice Safe Sex Indefinitely
headline.print_headline: Indefinite Safe Sex Urged for Liberia Ebola Survivors

snippet: After an Ebola death, scientists want to gather more information on the length of time the virus might remain present in semen.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
